q1: Were you supporting Croatia in the World Cup Final? I was!
a1: I liked both teams but Croatia was the underdog to root for because of how hard they worked to get there.
q2: Yes, I had to like Croatia better.
a2: Croatia put in the effort, but France were better overall.
q3: What do you think of France's defense?
a3: I think their defense is young and strong, especially Samuel Umtiti and Benjamin Pavard.
a5: I think so, they have the right squad
